title: GIF-JOBS
author: GIF-JOBS
content: Hello, I am a newbie fo this forum. I am a son of a poor family. My father was an employee of a government school. At that time my father's monthly income was $150. Our family had to survive for a month with this salary. My father was very old, then it was time for my father to retire, in that retirement he gave my father $1000 as retirement money. Two weeks after retirement my father unfortunately lost one of his legs in a road accident. At that time my family was very broken, after my father was admitted to the hospital he was treated with that retirement money. The doctor said my father will never be able to walk on two legs again. Since then my family started suffering. Father's retirement money was exhausted due to treatment. Due to lack of money, my family could not eat and drink properly and could not give my father proper medicine. Having no means, my mother started working in people's homes. My elder sister started tutoring to pursue her studies. And I started working in a motorcycle garage.  I had a wish that I would become a cryptocurrency investor i.e. I would earn money from cryptocurrency. For this I had no device i.e. no computer or mobile. So I give two-thirds of the money I get working in the motorcycle garage to my family and keep one for myself to buy a mobile. And finally I bought a mobile worth $100.  I am very interested in crypto currency, so as soon as I bought the mobile, I started looking everywhere. When I get home from work I search and research about cryptocurrencies all the time. And finally I found this forum. This is my very first post on this forum. I have a fair understanding of Cryptocurrencies and I have also done a lot of research on Bitcoin. I found that investing in Bitcoin long-term can make a lot of money. So my next target is to invest in Bitcoin. I will work in this motorcycle garage as before and give two thirds to the family and keep one for myself (to invest in bitcoins) as before.  Now that I am new to this forum, what should I do first in this forum? What is my first job on this forum? And how can I proceed to this forum? please tell me.I want to continue working on this forum with my best.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: First this is not a forum to come share your problems, everyone here has his/her issues but this is a forum where we discussed crypto-currency.Firstly I would advice you to do lots of reading so as to understand more about crypto-currency.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1588906.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1629118.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1631151.0Above are links that can help you to get more information and understanding about Bitcoin although you need to do more research.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2766177.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1689727.0Above is helpful link for newbies like yourself always read the rules and regulations of the forum to guide you.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Not to disinterest you in this industry, but I don't think you'll create any meaningful change in your case by investing in bitcoin. What you really need here is cash flow, which you can gain from getting a job, doing gigs, or starting a small business.

comments.author: Luffygroove
comments.body: I'm truly sorry to hear about your father's accident, and I wish your family strength during this challenging time. Investing directly in Bitcoin might be heavy in your current situation; Bitcoin is more for the long term. However, during a bull run, there's potential for profit if approached wisely. Learning the fundamentals quickly is key. Once you grasp the basics, exploring Altcoins becomes an option. With some, you can start with a small investment and potentially gain larger profits, but be aware, they come with higher risks and volatility compared to Bitcoin. Take your time to understand before diving in.

comments.author: Finestream
comments.body: Find a stable job first that compensates you well before you will decide to take the risk in bitcoin investment. Bitcoin is not money making. It's a form of digital currency and an investment too but the fact that you are still learning in the process, bitcoin will never guarantee profit making. Instead, study the forum first and increase your knowledge and insights about bitcoin, so you will be aware of the dos and donts when dealing with bitcoin.For now, focus first on finding a good, stable job that will sustain the needs of your family. Just think of investing when your funds are already capable to invest.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: I'm sorry to know about your family situation or problems. You are not the only one who has issues because I also have and other people too. Well, there are various things you can do to earn where many of them is risky but to be honest though, there's no such thing as not risky when it comes to earning money take trading for example. If you have made some research then you may have known this already and the risk you will take if you started this path. Aside from that, you should learning about this forum especially the forum rules and posting etiquette. There are threads you can search here about it. There is nothing wrong with sharing your story here but as the others said this is not a forum about it but about Cryptocurrency.

comments.author: odunybiz
comments.created_time: December 07, 2023, 11:55:45 PMLast edit: December 08, 2023, 01:17:12 AM by odunybiz
comments.body: I'm deeply sorry for the whole incident. But OP making money from this forum doesn't come easily and quickly as you think. It really involve enough dedication and hardworking. And as a newbie, you have a lot to learn to make it in this space. With the present situation of your family, I think investing all your savings in Bitcoin isn't a very nice idea. With your post, you are more dependant than others in the family for money, then what happens in case of any emergency and all savings has been invested on bitcoin? I think you should double your hustle. Get part of your savings for real life investment (visible business) that can give you instant profit and invest the remaining on Bitcoin for future use.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: With your current rank, it will take a while before you can have an opportunity to earn in this forum unless you have services and other goods you wanted to sell, and it can be offered on the  Marketplace boards.  I agree with mk4, you need an extra job that will pay you regularly to help your family situation.  Investing in Bitcoin in your current situation will not only take some fund from your family but also takes time to get profit and may probably have a risk of losing if you don't secure your Bitcoin wallet.You can develop your account by the given ideas of other members but I believe you should focus on how to get extra earnings that can give you an immediate profit to help you in your finances.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Sorry for you and your family. It's good to see you on the forum, and welcome here. It seems you are in a critical situation but are interested in crypto. I don't know how you introduced the forum, but keep in mind that this isn't an earning platform. You can learn from this related crypto and may apply. Crypto won't change your life overnight, but it could. You have to learn and struggle to earn decent money. Then you may invest in Bitcoin to grow your capital. Crypto is a risky investment, so invest that you can afford to lose. So, spend more time learning crypto and making an investment strategy.

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: I am sorry to hear about the tragedy that befell your family. I want to say, behind sadness there will definitely be happiness.Now you decide which way to go next, whether you want to be successful or remain in the current situation. Develop your skills in real life to earn a steady income to support yourself, your family and save some to invest in Bitcoin.You can do online work after you are not busy with offline work, develop your knowledge in investing and always take the time to visit forums consistently. You can get a lot of knowledge about investment here, you also need to comply with all forum rules to make it easier to develop an account. Looking for side income on forums is not a bad idea. Apart from being able to develop knowledge about how to invest, you can also join the Bitcoin payment signature campaign, but to be able to become a participant in the Bitcoin payment signature campaign you must at least reach the rank of Full member.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: I thought that I am reading a very familiar post that in the end, you'll ask people for donations. But I was wrong and you've proved me wrong for not saying such and you're wanting to stand on your own on getting out of that tough situation that you're in. Honestly, I'd commend you for writing this perfectly on a mobile. Because if I am on a mobile, I can't write this good with those space and seem to have no wrong words or misspelling. Anyway, I agree to what mk4 has said. You need more cash flow and get more gigs that you can take as you fix motorcycles, etc. And after that, that's where you'll be able to invest in Bitcoin.Quote from: GIF-JOBS on December 07, 2023, 10:09:21 AMNow that I am new to this forum, what should I do first in this forum? What is my first job on this forum? And how can I proceed to this forum? please tell me.I want to continue working on this forum with my best.Links where given to you and knowing the forum rules will help you. That's the first job that you need to do. And about real jobs, getting some gigs with the use of mobile, I think that you'll have hard time doing so. But anyway, you seem to be a great writer and even in mobile you might get into writing gigs try to find one on the Services or freelancing websites. Good luck and learn more through the forum, I wish you and your family all the best.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: GIF-JOBS on December 07, 2023, 10:09:21 AMNow that I am new to this forum, what should I do first in this forum? What is my first job on this forum? And how can I proceed to this forum? please tell me.You have the right mindset for looking for something to do instead of going around begging, many people just give up when they find themselves in situations like yours. We have had people that their stories isn't as bad as yours yet instead of them to look for what they'll do to elevate their situation, they keep begging and looking for favours. I most commend you and encourage you to continue living as there's hope for the living and no hope for the dead. Channel your energy into building a brand for yourself on the forum and you can use the forum as a platform to sell your skills and look for other crypto related jobs on the forum.The forum wasn't created as a job seeking platform so you need to remove that from you mind if you want to move forward but that doesn't mean you can't get one here. Before thinking about earning from the forum, build yourself and make your presence useful on the forum. When you're useful, your posts will be rewarded and your rank on the forum increases then you can apply for signature campaign or get more trust when you sell your skills as a newbie is less likely to be trusted irrespective of how well you know your skills but a higher rank give you some advantage.I'll love to see you grow here as we all deserve a second chance at life and I believe hanging around the forum with users of high intelligence in Bitcoin and cryptocurrency in general will help you a lot. It has helped some of us here and I look forward to see you celebrating the forum for its impact in your life like others.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: GIF-JOBS on December 07, 2023, 10:09:21 AMI found that investing in Bitcoin long-term can make a lot of money. So my next target is to invest in Bitcoin. I will work in this motorcycle garage as before and give two thirds to the family and keep one for myself (to invest in bitcoins) as before.  I must have to tell you that investing in Bitcoin for long term is surely profitable but you won't make a lot of money by investing in Bitcoin. The current price of Bitcoin is already over $43k and if you start investing in Bitcoin $50 a month that would not make you rich or a millionaire by any means. I know that if you're looking to have a better future and want to be financially stable in future then Bitcoin investment will be very helpful but it won't make you a lot of money if you currently don't have a lot of money to invest in it. I would say that it's still better to invest in Bitcoin instead of depositing your money into a bank because the fiat is highly affected by inflation and that means your money will lose its value overtime, but if you invest that money into Bitcoin then you'll at least make some good returns if Bitcoin price reaches or crosses $1 Million per coin.Quote from: GIF-JOBS on December 07, 2023, 10:09:21 AMNow that I am new to this forum, what should I do first in this forum? What is my first job on this forum? And how can I proceed to this forum? please tell me.I want to continue working on this forum with my best.I would recommend you to learn about Bitcoin in detail first as that's the most important thing you need to learn about. Your first job on this forum is to learn about Bitcoin and read as much about it as you possibly can. Once you learned enough about Bitcoin then you can create good threads or posts on the forum to help others or share your own opinion about Bitcoin which might be helpful for others. If you want to earn basically from the signature campaigns then you'll have to be at least a full member in rank and in order to reach full member rank you'll have to make good quality and helpful posts. The good posts will help you to earn some merits which are needed to rank up on the forum. You can begin learning about Bitcoin by reading posts in Bitcoin discussion board as that should be a good starting point. Best of luck!

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Quote from: GIF-JOBS on December 07, 2023, 10:09:21 AMI am very interested in crypto currency, so as soon as I bought the mobile, I started looking everywhere. When I get home from work I search and research about cryptocurrencies all the time. And finally I found this forum. This is my very first post on this forum. I have a fair understanding of Cryptocurrencies and I have also done a lot of research on Bitcoin. I found that investing in Bitcoin long-term can make a lot of money. So my next target is to invest in Bitcoin. I will work in this motorcycle garage as before and give two thirds to the family and keep one for myself (to invest in bitcoins) as before.  Now that I am new to this forum, what should I do first in this forum? What is my first job on this forum? And how can I proceed to this forum? please tell me.I want to continue working on this forum with my best.Hello and welcome to the forum! I read what you wrote and feel sad about your struggle but, that what is life is all about. You made the right decision to invest in Bitcoin and I am sure you know how to buy Bitcoin but, do you know how to store it safely? There is a child board which you can visit and take a look at. Wallet Software is the board where you can find recommended Bitcoin wallets and discussion about them, if you have any questions about wallets you can ask questions to get your answer.The forum was not created to earn money in general but if you have any online skill that you want to sell for Bitcoin then you can visit Services child board. Remember that you need to grow in rank if you want to be part of a Signature campaign or other Bounty campaign. To understand how the rank and merit system work you can refer to this thread by the admin, Merit & new rank requirements  The last thing you need to do is to stay active and by active I mean to respond to posts and ask questions on Bitcoin and crypto on their relevant board. Follow the rules and make new anonymous friends and you will grow in the forum gradually.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: GIF-JOBS on December 07, 2023, 10:09:21 AMNow that I am new to this forum, what should I do first in this forum? Being a newbie, here are the first things you're expected to Know and follow about the forum, pay attention to them and adhere strictly to tge forum's rules and other important guides belowUnofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0posting etiquetteshttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5184741.0#post_altgiveawayeverything you need to know about forum rank, activities and merits.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2766177.0Quote from: GIF-JOBS on December 07, 2023, 10:09:21 AMWhat is my first job on this forum? The forum requires nothing from you being a newbie than to learn and understand bitcoin and the forum, then join the numbers of those contributing to the forum with quality posts.Lastly before i forget this, don't plagiarize.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: At first I would welcome you to bitcointalk platform. You are in the right place to gain more knowledge on Bitcoin and the Crypto currency. I have read through your post and I must say it is really a difficult experience for you to be going through at the point in your life. I just believe your current situation is part of your making process because it would make you stronger in life.I have seen many recommendations for you to go with and I must say they are all quite alright to follow. As a newbie here there are lots you would need to learn more about but only what it takes is patience, consistency, commitment and focus. All these put together would put you on the right spot on this platform to building your account to the level at which you can be able to work and earn Bitcoin on weekly basis to support yourself and family. Aside that, if you are determined, you can learn some digital skills here for which you can be hired paid as well and that would mean some extra income for you.I will advise you to take out time read through all the recommendations as proffered by some reputable members here. I believe it would help you scale through your stay here. Also do well to read the pinned post on any thread you open to further gain more knowledge on how this platform works. That would help you alot here.

If you want to invest in bitcoin I will advice you to go for bitcoin because it is reliable , and you just need to try to get a source of income which will help you in your investment.

comments.author: Litzki1990
comments.body: Before your father's accident he was the sole bread earner of the family but now he is confined to a wheel chair due to an accident and now the responsibility of the family falls on you. First you should find a permanent job from where you will get money every month for sure. It is impossible to run a family depending on investment in the first stage because investing will definitely not make you money, in which case you may face problems in running the family later. When you have a job, you can live well with your family with the salary of that job and you can invest for the future, I think it will be a good decision for you. You may not want to directly rely on your investments beforehand.

comments.author: Zoomic
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk forum. You are not in the wrong place. Before any other thing, do well to go through the forum rules and regulations,  read previous posts and threads and ask questions where you need clarity. Note that for every offence, their are consequences.  If you are committed,  you will gain a lot from this forum.Your story is quite pathetic and I admire your courage for accepting to take up the family's responsibility. There are lots of benefits you will get from investing in Bitcoin but, do not expect returns on your investment immediately. For you to Really earn from Bitcoin, prepare your mind for a long-term journey. You still need a good job, another source of stable income you can rely on pending when you start earning from Bitcoin. Putting all your hope on your bitcoin investment might drive you into making wrong decisions with negative consequences.

comments.author: Vaculin
comments.body: Sorry to hear about what your family has gone through. Your family will overcome all of it in time. However, with regards to your concern, since you're still a newbie and has no good experiences in the market be it long term hodling or trading, then it's best to study first the market well through this forum and understand the rules in the forum. If you never go against with the rules, then you're safe and would stay longer learning in this forum.For now, it's hard to find a source of income since you're still in the process of learning. Rank up first from your position and learn from those reputable members how to make quality post, that way you can be qualified for signature campaigns in the future. Don't jump into investing or trading, but learn first from the experiences of other members and try to analyze and assess the risks first if you are capable to overcome it or you might be like other newbies that end up quitting and regretting.
